title: Total Opportunities by Type
description: The TAO or Total Actionable Opportunity has been generated below by applying business rules against the installed base in order to determine which opportunities are actionable. To see the TAO rules for each opportunity type select  the desired VIEW and access the information text.

title: Total Opportunities by Period
description: Total Actionable Opportunity for Refresh, Renew, and Attach by Fiscal Quarter.

title: Total Opportunities by
description:
Sales Level - Total Actionable Opportunity for each sales level below the filtered level according to the sales hierarchy.

Partner - Total Actionable Opportunity for the top 100 Partners.

Customer - Total Actionable Opportunity for the top 100 Sales Account View (SAV) names.
